question_text: Which statements correctly describe the concept of high availability in cloud computing? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: It ensures continued service during hardware failures
It requires the customer to manually implement backups
It uses redundancy across data centers
It eliminates the need for network connectivity
It may include failover mechanisms to alternate sites
correct_answer: It ensures continued service during hardware failures
It uses redundancy across data centers
It may include failover mechanisms to alternate sites
explanation: High availability uses redundancy and automated failover to keep services online even if infrastructure fails.
